name: Pancakes
preparationSteps: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar in a bowl.
Add milk, egg, and melted butter, and mix until smooth.
Heat a pan over medium heat and pour batter.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden brown.

name: Omelette
description: Savory omelette with vegetables and cheese.
preparationSteps: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Pour eggs into a hot skillet with butter.
Add vegetables and cheese, cook until set.
Fold the omelette and serve.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp Caesar salad with chicken and croutons.
preparationSteps: Chop lettuce, add croutons and grated Parmesan.
Toss with Caesar dressing and top with grilled chicken.
Serve chilled.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Vegetable pasta in a light garlic sauce.
preparationSteps: Cook pasta as per instructions.
Sauté vegetables in olive oil with garlic.
Mix pasta with vegetables, season, and serve.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Salmon grilled with herbs and lemon.
preparationSteps: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Grill for 5 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon slices.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
preparationSteps: Cook pasta according to package.
Sauté onions and garlic, add ground beef and cook.
Stir in tomato sauce, simmer until thick.
Serve sauce over pasta.

name: Chocolate Cake
preparationSteps: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder.
Add eggs, milk, and oil; mix until smooth.
Bake at 350°F for 30-35 minutes.

name: Ice Cream Sundae
preparationSteps: Scoop ice cream into a bowl.
Add chocolate syrup, nuts, and cherries.
Serve immediately.

name: Spring Rolls
preparationSteps: Chop vegetables and mix with seasoning.
Wrap in spring roll wrappers.
Deep fry until golden brown.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
preparationSteps: Remove stems, stuff mushrooms with cheese mixture.
Bake until mushrooms are tender.

name: Smoothie Bowl
description: Fresh fruit smoothie bowl topped with granola.
preparationSteps: Blend frozen fruit, yogurt, and juice until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and fruit slices.

name: Green Juice
description: Healthy green juice with kale, spinach, and apple.
preparationSteps: Blend kale, spinach, apple, and cucumber.
Strain and serve over ice.

name: Special Pizza
preparationSteps: Spread pizza dough with sauce.
Top with cheese, veggies, and gourmet toppings.
Bake until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
